text: The men's eight competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. A top-five finish ensured qualification for the Tokyo Olympics. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 12:35 || Heats |- | Thursday 29 August 2019 || 13:59 || Repechage |- | rowspan=2|Sunday 1 September 2019 || 12:42 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 14:12 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The two fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Weißenfeld, Follert, Reinhardt, Johannesen, Schneider, Jakschik, Schmidt, Ocik, Sauer | align="left"| | 5:30.28 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Forsterling, Purnell, Moore, Keenan, Booth, Masters, Turrin, Widdicombe, Brodie | align="left"| | 5:32.91 | FA |- | 3 | align="left"|Copp, Perry, Stone, de Wit, Barakso, Bailey, Buczek, Crothers, Thompson-Willie | align="left"| | 5:35.46 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Gabbia, Liuzzi, Parlato, Perino, Fiume, Paonessa, Mumolo, Pietra, D'Aniello | align="left"| | 5:42.74 | R |- | 5 | align="left"|Rudnichenko, Kuznetsov, Lomachev, Kulesh, Yaganov, Stepanov, Ivanov, Andrienko, Safonkin | align="left"| | 5:43.71 | R |} ====Heat 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|George, Rudkin, Bugajski, Sbihi, Dawson, Wynne-Griffith, Tarrant, Ford, Fieldman | align="left"| | 5:25.91 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Karwoski, Eble, Harrity, Mead, Richards, di Santo, Davison, Hack, Venonsky | align="left"| | 5:26.41 | FA |- | 3 | align="left"|Versluis, Knab, Tissen, van Dorp, Hurkmans, Schwarz, van den Ende, Lücken, Kops | align="left"| | 5:26.75 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Lassche, Bond, Kirkham, Drysdale, Robertson, Wilson, MacDonald, Jones, Bosworth | align="left"| | 5:35.73 | R |- | 5 | align="left"|Chioseaua, Damii, Matinca, Adam, Pîrghie, Bejan, Aicoboae, Macovei, Munteanu | align="left"| | 5:42.30 | R |} ===Repechage=== The two fastest boats advanced to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the B final. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|van den Ende, Knab, Tissen, van Dorp, Hurkmans, Schwarz, Versluis, Lücken, Kops | align="left"| | 5:21.60 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Lassche, Bond, Kirkham, Drysdale, Robertson, Wilson, MacDonald, Jones, Bosworth | align="left"| | 5:24.66 | FA |- | 3 | align="left"|Chioseaua, Damii, Radu, Adam, Pîrghie, Bejan, Aicoboae, Macovei, Munteanu | align="left"| | 5:27.19 | FB |- | 4 | align="left"|Copp, Perry, Stone, de Wit, Barakso, Bailey, Buczek, Crothers, Thompson-Willie | align="left"| | 5:30.60 | FB |- | 5 | align="left"|Gabbia, Liuzzi, Parlato, Perino, Fiume, Paonessa, Mumolo, Pietra, D'Aniello | align="left"| | 5:34.59 | FB |- | 6 | align="left"|Rudnichenko, Kuznetsov, Lomachev, Kulesh, Yaganov, Stepanov, Ivanov, Andrienko, Safonkin | align="left"| | 5:38.10 | FB |} ===Finals=== The A final determined the rankings for places 1 to 6. Additional rankings were determined in the B final. ====Final B==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | 1 | align="left"|Chioseaua, Damii, Matinca, Adam, Pîrghie, Bejan, Aicoboae, Macovei, Munteanu | align="left"| | 5:38.91 |- | 2 | align="left"|Copp, Perry, Stone, de Wit, Barakso, Bailey, Buczek, Crothers, Thompson-Willie | align="left"| | 5:42.09 |- | 3 | align="left"|Gabbia, Liuzzi, Parlato, Perino, Fiume, Paonessa, Mumolo, Pietra, D'Aniello | align="left"| | 5:48.33 |- | 4 | align="left"|Rudnichenko, Kuznetsov, Lomachev, Kulesh, Yaganov, Stepanov, Ivanov, Andrienko, Safonkin | align="left"| | 5:54.41 |} ====Final A==== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Weißenfeld, Follert, Reinhardt, Johannesen, Schneider, Jakschik, Schmidt, Ocik, Sauer | align="left"| | 5:19.41 |- | | align="left"|Versluis, Knab, Tissen, van Dorp, Hurkmans, Schwarz, van den Ende, Lücken, Kops | align="left"| | 5:19.96 |- | | align="left"|George, Rudkin, Bugajski, Sbihi, Dawson, Wynne-Griffith, Tarrant, Ford, Fieldman | align="left"| | 5:22.35 |- | 4 | align="left"|Forsterling, Purnell, Moore, Keenan, Booth, Masters, Turrin, Widdicombe, Brodie | align="left"| | 5:22.88 |- | 5 | align="left"|Karwoski, Eble, Harrity, Mead, Richards, di Santo, Davison, Hack, Venonsky | align="left"| | 5:23.92 |- | 6 | align="left"|Lassche, Bond, Kirkham, Drysdale, Robertson, Wilson, MacDonald, Jones, Bosworth | align="left"| | 5:24.470 |} ==References== Category:2019 World Rowing Championships
title: 2019 World Rowing Championships – Men's eight
